TEI:
&teiHeader; &facsimile;
Alle halewene da&ydot; we holdez &punctelev; one time in þe &yogh;ere
For manie enche&slong;one&slong; holie churche Holie Churche
&punctelev; þare to u&slong; gan lere
On i&slong; for þe grete noumb&rrot;e &punctelev; þat of alle halewe is
Þat euerech ne mai nou&yogh;t at i&slong; fe&slong;te &punctelev; ane da&ydot; habbe i wis
An oþur is þat we beoth feble &punctelev; þat we ne mouwen nou&yogh;t alle
Þe fe&slong;tene bi heom &slong;ulf holde &punctelev; a&slong;e hu&ydot; in þe &yogh;ere doth falle
Þe þridde anche&slong;on is for þe &yogh;er is &slong;chort &punctelev; a&slong;e ech ne ma&ydot; nou&yogh;th allone
Þe fe&slong;te habbe in þe &yogh;ere &punctelev; þare hu&ydot; habbez i mone ·
Þe feorþe enche&slong;un i&slong; i wi&slong;&punctelev;for guod ri&yogh;ht it is with alle
Þat we of heom maken fe&slong;te&punctelev; &yogh;wane þe time doth falle
Fo&rrot; gret fe&slong;te hu&ydot; makiez in heouene&punctelev; and in grete Io&ydot;e beoth
&YOGH;wan hu&ydot; an&ydot; amendement &punctelev; of us on v&rrot;þe i &slong;eoth
For þe guod &slong;pel &slong;eith of swich gret Io&ydot;e &punctelev; þat among heom in heouene is
&YOGH;wane ani of u&slong; a mendi wole &punctelev; of þat we doth a mis
¶þe fifte enche&slong;un is fo&rrot; þare wa&slong; &punctelev; a fo&rrot;bu&ydot;&slong;ne þar of bi gonne
Longue are þe &slong;trencþe of c&combtildevert;&slong;tindom Cri&slong;tindom
&punctelev; on v&rrot;þe were i wonne
Fo&rrot; þe he&ydot;&yogh;e ma&ydot;&slong;tres of sare&slong;ins &punctelev; þat on v&rrot;þe weren þo here
Maden ech maumat bi heom&slong;ulf &punctelev; at rome Rome on Auter
Ac natheles of eche ne mi&yogh;hte he nou&yoght;t &punctelev; fo&rrot; here gode&slong; Gode&slong; &slong;o fale were
And hu&ydot; nolden nou&yogh;th þat ani god were &punctelev; withoute honour þere
Þare fo&rrot;e hu&ydot; maden on Auter &punctelev;
commu&ydot;n Commu&ydot;n to ech one
Fo&rrot; to honouri alle heo&rrot;e gode&slong; Gode&slong; þare &punctelev; a&slong;e it were al i mone
And &slong;ethþe þo c&combtildevert;&slong;tindom Cri&slong;tindom cam &punctelev; and &slong;w&ydot;þe wide &slong;p&rrot;adde
At rome Rome and eke elles&yogh;ware &punctelev; clanliche þe ma&ydot;&slong;trie hadde
¶Bonefas þe guode pope &punctelev; to þe fal&slong;e Autere&slong; cam
And of þe Autere of alle godes Godes
&punctelev; grete &yogh;eme he nam
In fo&rrot;ebu&ydot;&slong;ne þar of &punctelev; ane churche he liet a rere
Of o&rrot;e lauedi and of alle haluwene &punctelev; in þulke place þe
Ake six hund&rrot;et &yogh;er and fiue &punctelev; o&rrot;e louerd Louerd bifo&rrot;e
Of marie marie Marie is &slong;uete moder &punctelev; on v&rrot;þe wa&slong; i bo&rrot;e
¶Þe churche þat of o&rrot;e lauedi wa&slong; &punctelev; and of alle halewene þo bi founde
Stant &yogh;eot at Rome and is i cleped &punctelev; Marie la rounde
Þe pope al&slong;o Bonefaz &punctelev; ane day in þe &yogh;ere
In þe honour of alle halewene &punctelev; he liet halewi þere
And hiet al&slong;o þo&rrot;u&yogh;h al c&combtildevert;&slong;tindom Cri&slong;tindom
&punctelev;halewi þilke da&ydot;
Ake þulke t&ydot;me he wa&slong; i holde &punctelev; þe endlefte dai of ma&ydot;
Ake þe pope Grego&rrot;i &punctelev; þat þare aftur longue cam
I&slong;a&ydot;&yogh; þat þe da&ydot; to halewi wa&slong; &punctelev; ope al c&combtildevert;&slong;tindom Cri&slong;tindom
And þat ri&yogh;ht wa&slong; þat ech man &punctelev; þe hexte and le&slong;te
In þe honour of alle haluwene &punctelev; made þane da&ydot; fe&slong;te
And in a &slong;kars t&ydot;me of þe &yogh;ere &punctelev; a&slong;e we w&ydot;ten it wa&slong; in Ma&ydot;
So gret fe&slong;te fo&rrot;to holde &punctelev; a&slong;e ful to þad da&ydot;
Þarefo&rrot;e he liet þane da&ydot; tu&ydot;rne &punctelev; a&slong;e we him holdez &yogh;u&ydot;te
In þe fur&slong;te dai of nouemb&rrot;e Nouemb&rrot;e
&punctelev; &yogh;wane ech guod ni&slong; nouh&yogh;t &slong;o lu&ydot;te
¶Me þinchez &yogh;u&ydot;t quath þe guode man &punctelev; þe fe&slong;te feble were
bote Men men hadden &yogh;ware with &punctelev; þe wombe Io&ydot;e arere
¶Þe fur&slong;te &yogh;er þare afturward &punctelev; þat men þane da&ydot; þu&slong; nome
Of a fair cas ich ma&ydot; telle &punctelev; þat bi feol in þe churche of rome Rome
Þe wardein of seint petere&slong; church &punctelev; þat &yogh;u&ydot;t in rome Rome is
Þe fe&slong;te honourede &slong;w&ydot;þe muche &punctelev; of alle halewene iwi&slong;
on alle halewene da&ydot; in churche &punctelev; to ech auter he gan gon
And honourede ech aftur oþur &punctelev; he ne liet nou&yogh;ht on
To þe hei&yogh;e auter of seint petre &punctelev; ate la&slong;te he wende
And þare he la&ydot; a doun an &slong;lep &punctelev; a&slong;e god him g&rrot;ce&slong;ende
him þou&yogh;te þare cam an Aungel &punctelev; and ladde him to heouene on hei&yogh;h
In a cha&ydot;ere with gret Io&ydot;e &punctelev; ore louerd him þou&yogh;hte he &slong;ei&yogh;h
with grete hei&yogh;hne&slong;&slong;e &slong;itte &punctelev; and Aungles him al a boute
¶Þo cam þare a fair leuedi &punctelev; with Ma&ydot;denes a gret route
Þat wa&slong; o&rrot;e lauedi with virgine&slong; &punctelev; and o&rrot;e louerd faire heo grette
Ore louerd a &yogh;ein hire a ros &punctelev; and bi him fa&ydot;re hire &slong;ette
Þo cam þare a Man in o sclaue&ydot;n &punctelev; a&slong;e hit of a Cama&ydot;le were
And olde ho&rrot;e Men aftur him &punctelev; and honoureden god þere
Þat wa&slong; seint Iohan þe bapti&slong;t &punctelev; and þe profete&slong; olde
And al&slong;o þe patriarke&slong; &punctelev; þat of o&rrot;e louerd &yogh;w&ydot;lene tolde
¶Þo comen þare twelue in one route &punctelev; a&slong;e bi&slong;chope&slong; it weren ech one
Þe fur&slong;te a&slong;e hu&ydot; pope&slong; weren &punctelev; bi fo&rrot;e he &yogh;eode al one
Þat wa&slong; seint petre &punctelev; and his felawe&slong; endleuene
Alle hu&ydot; honourede o&rrot;e louerd &punctelev; þare he &slong;at in heouene
¶Þo comen þare a&slong;e hit kn&ydot;&yogh;hte&slong; weren &punctelev; redie fo&rrot; to fi&yogh;hte
Al blodie fo&rrot; to defendi o&rrot;e louerd &punctelev; and holie churche Holie Churche ri&yogh;hte
Þat weren Mart&ydot;s þat fo&rrot; god &punctelev; and holie churche Holie Churche al&slong;o
&YOGH;euen heore lif a&slong;e gode&slong; kn&ydot;&yogh;hte&slong; &punctelev; and to deþe weren ido
¶Þo cam þare a gret compa&ydot;gnie &punctelev; p&rrot;eo&slong;te&slong; a&slong;e þei it were
Þat weren þe confe&slong;&slong;ours &punctelev; þat hadden holie churche Holie Churche to lere
A&slong;e bi&slong;chopes and Abbodes &punctelev; and oþur guode men al&slong;o
Ore louerd hu&ydot; honoureden alle &punctelev; a&slong;e heo&rrot;e ri&yogh;hte wa&slong; to do
Of fe&slong;te þat Men on v&rrot;þe maden &punctelev; hu&ydot; þonkeden him and bade
fo&rrot; alle þat ari&yogh;ht heo&rrot;e da&ydot; heolden &punctelev; and fe&slong;te of heom made
¶Þo goune hu&ydot; &slong;ingue heo&rrot;e Matine&slong; &punctelev; sw&ydot;þ murie with alle
fo&rrot; alle þat honouriez heo&rrot;e da&ydot; here &punctelev; a&slong;e heo in þe &yogh;ere doth falle
wel ou&yogh;hte we þane da&ydot; honouren &punctelev; &yogh;wane hu&ydot; þat ilke da&ydot;
Swuch Io&ydot;e for u&slong; in heouene maden &punctelev; a&slong;e þe guode Man i&slong;a&ydot;
Nou bidde alle halewene &punctelev; þat we heo&rrot;e fe&slong;te holden so
Þat hu&ydot; u&slong; b&rrot;inguen to þe he&ydot;&yogh;e Io&ydot;e &punctelev; þare hu&ydot; buth inne i do
